label: 偏継
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Character parts (hentsugi) was another game of skill, the exact nature of which is no longer understood.  Players were probably required to supply either the left-hand element (hen) or the body (tsukuri) of a partially concealed character in a Chinese poem or other context (p.365).  [偏、旁]
